# encode(with:)

**Instance Method**

Serializes the view to the specified coder.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency override dynamic func encode(with coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An object that the view serializes to.

## Overview

This property inherits from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

## Accessing view features

- **subviews**: An array that contains the view’s subviews.
- **layoutSubviews()**: Instructs the view’s subviews to position within the view.
- **traitCollectionDidChange(_:)**: Notifies the view when the device orientation changes.
